full_summary:
Government of Canada
Tender Announcement
E60HL-230052-B
Bulk Aviation Fuel 2023-2025
[April 6, 2023]

## Notice Overview
This is an invitation to qualified suppliers to participate in a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for bulk aviation fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards.

## Contract Details
* Auction Number: WS3761283182
* Solicitation Number: WS3761283182
* Amendment Number: 0
* Tender Closing Date: April 11, 2023 - 14:00

## Contract Specifications
The procurement is for bulk aviation fuels subject to the Tlicho Land Claims Agreement, the Gwich'in Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, and the Inuvialuit Final Agreement for deliveries to Inuvik, NT and Yellowknife, NT.

* Delivery Locations: various locations in Canada including Alberta, British Columbia, Newfoundland and Labrador, Ontario (except NCR), and Saskatchewan
* Delivery Dates: on an as-and-when-requested basis from date of issuance up to and including March 31, 2025
* Contract Type: National Master Standing Offer
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procedure: Competitive - Open bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Implementing Organization: Canadian Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Goods/Services Code: 15101504/Aviation fuel

## Important Information
Please note that the response deadline closing time has been modified to April 11, 2023 - 14:00. Any bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on April 11, 2023 before the specified closing time.

For any questions or inquiries, please contact Pam Munz at pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
